quote: A strong mind requires a strong vessel. Don't neglect it.

task: Review 2 Data Structure questions you got wrong in the past.
quote: Ignoring your past failures guarantees you will repeat them.

task: Stand up, stretch for 60 seconds, and drink a glass of water.
quote: Even a demon needs to hydrate. Your brain is useless if it's running on fumes.

task: Write down one concept you struggled with and explain it to a rubber duck.
quote: If you can't explain it simply, you don't understand it well enough. The duck is waiting.

task: Close your eyes and visualize the solution to the last problem you failed.
quote: The battlefield of the mind is where true victory is forged.
